# f5distributedcloud_voltstack_site (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_voltstack_site` resource manages Voltstack Sites in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Voltstack Sites are F5-managed compute infrastructure deployed at the edge.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_voltstack_site" "example" {
  name           = "edge-site-1"
  namespace      = "system"
  master_nodes   = 3
  worker_nodes   = 2
  site_type      = "REGIONAL_EDGE"
  volterra_region = "ves-io-us-west-2"
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `master_nodes` (Number) Number of master nodes.
- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)
- `site_type` (String) Type of Voltstack site.

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `volterra_region` (String) Volterra region for the site.
- `worker_nodes` (Number) Number of worker nodes.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
